alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Laurens; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville, central Anderson and northeastern Abbeville Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 759 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles north of Anderson to 12 miles east of Hartwell. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anderson, Fountain Inn, Homeland Park, Belton, Williamston, Honea Path, Due West, Iva, West Pelzer and Donalds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
